message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its potential value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,300,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price for the product, considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While $1,300,000 is certainly a respectable figure, I believe the true value of this product sits higher.  Would you consider $1,375,000? This allows us both to move closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
I'm still interested in the product, but I need to be more aggressive in my offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,350,000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
